docs.lead_paragraph: A remarkable story was told, to Judge Walton in the Supreme Court, yesterday forenoon. The narrator was a woman of twenty-seven years, who should be still young and comely, but instead she seemed an old and infirm woman, so much had hardship and affliction told upon her. Her name was Estella F. Cobb, and five years ago her sad story was in the months of all the fishermen who frequent the Bay of Fundy.

headline.main: PATHETIC STORY OF DESERTION.; A MAINE SAILOR LEAVES HIS FAMILY ADRIFT IN THE BAY OF FUNDY.

docs.abstract: Family Deserted in Bay of Fundy; Divorce
